name: Bottle (itch) (AshG)
description:
A day-glo absurdish point and click comic of loss and resolution based around a bottle washed up on the shore.

Point you mouse somewhere and click to move the story on.

Created with Léon's imgm game making tool.

Original images from pexels.com 

Music by me

This was intended to be a longer interactive point and click game, but it ended up being more of an incomplete single thread short digital comic.
